# Create cowplot
```{r,fig.height=16,fig.width=11.25}

fig2B <- ggplotify::grid2grob(plot(cognate_forest))
fig2C <- ggplotify::grid2grob(plot(dysbiosis_forest)) 

figure2 <- plot_grid(fig2A,fig2B,fig2C,labels = "AUTO",nrow=3,label_size = 18,rel_heights = c(1,1,1),label_x = 0,align = "hv",axis='l') 
figure2
```
